Bottom pager enabling previous/next navigation and direct page selection across four routes.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Shared layout providing header, footer, and sequencing controls around routed page content.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with themed icons and active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous IC actor, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables, fonts, and a repeating background image plus animation delay utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Page1Landing.tsx: Landing page showing animated hearts, a long romantic message, and two featured photos.
frontend/src/pages/Page2Memories.tsx: Memories page displaying a heading and a photo gallery of four selected images.
frontend/src/pages/Page3Flowers.tsx: Page showing a flowers image and a short sentimental message inside styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Page4Gallery.tsx: Gallery page listing the remaining uploaded photos using the PhotoGallery component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom colors, fonts, container settings, and animation plugins.
